title: Evaluate rename to omgrep/omg
description: Package name omgrep on crates.io, binary name omg. Evaluate: update Cargo.toml, README, CLAUDE.md, CLI help text, index dir (.omg/ vs .hhg/), manifest compat. Tie branding to omendb.

logs.msg: omgrep free on crates.io, omg binary name viable (only conflict is omg.lol CLI tool). Package=omgrep, binary=omg. Also hygrep name conflicts with existing tool.
